column5: After successfully using www.myfishingpictures.com for years to post pics I've suddenly become unable to...The reason being is when I log in my photos are HUGE, as opposed to displaying in thumbs like they used to! I'm convinced there's some simple solution that is eluding me! I;ve sent an email to the admins but thus far has gone unanswered...
The photos aren't huge, but the fish you catch are!
